author: random employee
article: We are opening a brand new restaurant! //n So this is it my friends. Today is THE day when we finally open our Waffle Shuffle restaurant at Mars, Elon Must is our biggest sponsor and we are most grateful for it. I am sure It is going to make a great profit. //n //n Can't wait to see you there, with love Nicol.
